summary:
This mod add a night sky texture to Skyrim as a part of the Eagle nebula.
It's called the "Stellar Spire".
Simple and Beautiful!
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=12][color=#0099ff]Eagle Nebula "Stellar Spire"[/color][/size][/b]
A night sky texture by [color=#0099ff]elmetnuter[/color]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/sRAkcwj.jpg[/img]

[b][color=#0099ff]VIDEO[/color][/b]
[url=http://youtu.be/E8zSzQHMQss?t=1m20s]Another Skyrim Mod Feature #09 by Nozi87[/url]
Please, see the video section for the complete tour of his mod review.


[b][color=#0099ff]WHAT IS IT?"[/color][/b]
This mod add a night sky texture to Skyrim as a part of the Eagle Nebula.
It's called the "Stellar Spire".
Simple and Beautiful!


[b][color=#0099ff]DISCLAIMER[/color][/b]
This is my first mod, so [be gentle with me] do not be gentle with me;
I am sure you have a basket full of old Riverwood vegetables ready to go.
If everything goes well, I will release other textures from other Nebulas in the next days ('Koz i luv Nebulaz!).
If you have any suggestions, tricks, helps and such or bug report, write me in P.M.


[b][color=#0099ff]HOW TO INSTALL?"[/color][/b]

[b][color=#0099ff]NMM (Nexus Mod Manager)[/color][/b] installation
Click the green button and do not forget to activate the mod once downloaded (I am not kidding, I use to forget all the time myself.)

[b][color=#0099ff]MANUAL[/color][/b] installation
Decompress the file in your "Data" folder which may be found:
Here:
[YOUR COMPUTER NAME] > [C:Program Files (x86)] > "The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim"
Or there:
[YOUR COMPUTER NAME] > [C:Games] > "The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim"


[b][color=#0099ff]WARNING & COMPATIBILITY[/color][/b]
If you have a mod that do the same, such as "Enhanced Night Skyrim", for example;
It will replace the texture in the very same folder.
Be sure that you have disabled or removed your previews mod first.
If you are using an "ENB" configuration and "Climate of Tamriel" at the same time:
The nebula might appear too bright for your taste, so let me know and I will do my best to make a better version.


[b][color=#0099ff]TOOLS[/color][/b]
Photoshop CC // image editing
7zip // compression


[b][color=#0099ff]CREDITS & PERMISSIONS[/color][/b]

[url=http://hubblesite.org/about_us/copyright.php]HUBBLE Copyright[/url]

[b][color=#0099ff]For my part:[/color][/b]
You may use this work with discretion as part of your personal entertainment.
If you feel using it in any kind of way, please, ask me first and credit me.
I will not give my permission for any kind of redistribution or upload anywhere than here on The Nexus.
It is exclusively made for Nexus users.

[b][color=#0099ff]Concerning Hubble site and the other parties involved[/color][/b]
You have to report properly the use or the derivative creation here:
[color=#0099ff]copyright@stsci.edu[/color]


[b][color=#0099ff]THANKS & INFOS[/color][/b]

[b][color=#0099ff]CptJoker71[/color][/b]
For his great mod that inspired me to work on my own night sky.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/85//?]Enhanced Night Skyrim[/url]

[i]And finally My Brain to have remembered me very lately but at least about the Alpha layer...[/i]
author: elmetnuter
